name: ELEVASION
description:
--- W/A or Arrow Keys to move Left/Right, Space to Jump ---

How long can you survive in this elevator dodge 'em up? Avoid falling debris as you hope to reach the end of this hellish elevator ride!

That is... if there is an end at all!

Art, Programming, Design and Music by Shin.

Follow Shin on on Twitter! ||| Follow our artist, Yuu!
